it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.view.client

Interface ViewMaker

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CLIViewMaker, GUIViewMaker

    public interface ViewMaker
    Interface defining methods that create new views for the ClientInstance objects. This provides an abstraction level between the client logic (i.e. network handling) and the user interface. Different interfaces can be created by simply create a new implementation of this interface.
